text: فكهين بما ءاتىهم ربهم ووقىهم ربهم عذاب الجحيم

translations.translation: savouring what their Lord has given them. Their Lord will safeguard them from the punishment of the Blazing Fire:
Rejoicing at what their Lord has given them; and their Lord will preserve them from the torment of Hell.
enjoying what Allah will have endowed them with; and their Lord will have saved them from the torment of the Blazing Fire.
talking of what they have received from their Lord and of how their Lord has saved them from the torment of hell.
Delighted at the bestowal of their Lord; and their Lord has saved them from the fire.
Enjoying in that which their Lord has bestowed on them, and (the fact that) their Lord saved them from the torment of the blazing Fire.
Rejoicing because of what their Lord gave them, and their Lord saved them from the punishment of the burning fire.
rejoicing in that their Lord has given them; and their Lord shall guard them against the chastisement of Hell.
Happy because of what their Lord hath given them, and (because) their Lord hath warded off from them the torment of hell-fire.
rejoicing in whatever their Lord has given them. Their Lord has saved them from the torment of the Fire,
Rejoicing in that which their Lord hath vouchsafed Unto them; and their Lord will protect them from the torment of the Flame.
rejoicing because of what their Lord has given them, and that their Lord has saved them from the punishment of hell.
Enjoying the (Bliss) which their Lord hath bestowed on them, and their Lord shall deliver them from the Penalty of the Fire.
Enjoying in that which their Lord has bestowed on them, and (the fact that) their Lord saved them from the torment of the blazing Fire.
rejoicing in all their Lord has given them, and their Lord will guard them against the punishment of Hell.
Enjoying what their Lord has given them, and their Lord has spared them the suffering of Hell.
Enjoying what their Lord has given them, and their Lord protected them from the punishment of Hellfire.

[52:18] rejoicing, delighting, in what (bi-mā relates to the verbal action) their Lord has given them, and [that] their Lord has shielded them from the chastisement of Hell-fire (wa-waqāhum rabbuhum ‘adhāba’l-jahīmi is a supplement to ātāhum, ‘[what He] has given them’, in other words, [rejoicing] in their having been given [this reward] and shielded [from Hell-fire]).
(Happy because of what your Lord hath given them) in the Garden, (and (because) their Lord hath warded off from them the torment of hellfire).

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { فَاكِهِينَ } يعني مُعجبين بما أَتاهُم رَبُّهم

translations.translation: And His saying, {fa-kihiina}, means those who are pleased with what their Lord has given them.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ فَاكِهِينَ } متنعمين مسرورين فيها
 مطمئنين راضين { بِمَآ آتَاهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ } بمقتضى فضله وسعة جوده ولطفه { وَ } بما { وَقَاهُمْ } وحفظهم { رَبُّهُمْ عَذَابَ ٱلْجَحِيمِ } [الطور: 18] أي: أهوالهم وأفزاعها


فيقال لهم فيها على سبيل التبشير والتفريح: { كُلُواْ } من الرزق الصوري والمعنوي { وَٱشْرَبُواْ } بلا تنقيص وتكليف { هَنِيئَاً بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ } [الطور: 19] أي: بسبب صالحات أعمالكم وحسنات أفعالكم


{ مُتَّكِئِينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ } معدة لهم { مَّصْفُوفَةٍ } منضودة مرتبة وفق أعمالهم وأحوالهم ومقاماتهم

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ ووقاهم رَبُّهم عذابَ الجحيم } عطف على " آتاهم " على أن " ما " مصدرية
 أي: فاكهين بإتياهنم وبوقايتهم
 أو: على " في جنات النعيم " أي: استقروا في جنات ووقاهم
 أو: حال
 إما من المستكن في الخبر
 أو: من فاعل " آتى " 
 أو: مفعوله بإضمار " قد "
 وإظهار الرب في موضع الإضمار مضافاً إلى ضمير { هم } لتشريفهم
 ويُقال لهم: { كُلوا واشربوا } ما شئتم { هنيئاً } أي: أكلاً وشرباً هنيئاً
 أو: طعاماً وشراباً هنيئاً
 لا تنغيص فيه بخوف انقطاعه أو فواته
